description: This file defines styles for a word puzzle game frontend, including themes, card components, buttons, and navigation styles.

classes.name: kavia-card
classes.description: Base styles for card components with theme-aware colors, padding, and hover effects.

classes.name: btn
classes.description: Base styles for buttons, including variants and interactive states.

classes.name: navbar
classes.description: Styles for the navigation bar, accommodating responsive design.
